entry.title: Koala Save my Land - Decal (HTV Decal - Iron On)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: HTV Ready Made Decals
Price: 7.00 - 12.00 (8 variants)

Transform a plain t-shirt or hoodie with these extremely popular designs.

Our decals are printed professionally in-house on matte finish Siser ColourPrint PU, a vinyl that is CPSIA Certified for use on children's clothing.  They arrive ready to press.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

May be applied to:
  • 100% cotton
  • 100% polyester 
  • poly/cotton blends 
  • Lycra°/spandex 
  • LeatherAdhesive Ready Made Decals
Preheat the item you are applying the decal to for 2-3 Seconds 
Press for 15-20 seconds at 295° F/146° C  with a medium pressure and peel hot.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS
  • Do not dry clean
  • Machine wash WARM / mild detergent 
  • Dry on normal setting 
  • No chlorine bleach
  • Wait 24 hours before first wash

entry.title: Winter Gnomes - HTV Decals
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: HTV Ready Made Decals
Price: 2.75 - 12.00 (20 variants)

Transform a plain onesie, bib, t-shirt or pillow cover into something unique with our ready to apply HTV decals. 

Do you need ideas to decorate a nursery? You could use a decal as the starting point.  These decals are also available in matte adhesive vinyl for wall applications.

SIZES

1)  I am the cutest

  • Extra-Small: 4 x 3.5 inches
  • Small: 5.5 x 4.9 inches
  • Medium: 7 x 6.25
  • Large: 8.5 x 7.6 inches
  • Extra-Large: 11 x 9.8 inches

2)  Other gnomes (approximate sizes, the lilac is taller but narrower)

  • Extra-Small: 4 x 2.4 inches
  • Small: 5.5 x 3.3 inches
  • Medium: 7 x 4.2 inches
  • Large: 8.5 x 5 inches
  • Extra-Large: 11 x 6.6 inches

Sizes may vary slightly than what is listed.  Custom sizes available upon request.

Our decals are printed professionally in-house on matte finish Siser ColourPrint PU, a vinyl that is CPSIA Certified for use on children's clothing.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

May be applied to:
  • 100% cotton
  • 100% polyester 
  • poly/cotton blends 
  • Lycra°/spandex 
  • LeatherAdhesive Ready Made Decals
Preheat the item you are applying the decal to for 2-3 Seconds 
Press for 15-20 seconds at 295° F/146° C  with a medium pressure and peel hot.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS
  • Do not dry clean
  • Machine wash WARM / mild detergent 
  • Dry on normal setting 
  • No chlorine bleach
  • Wait 24 hours before first wash

DIMENSIONS

Lucky Moon Owl

  • Small: 4" x 4.75"
  • Medium: 7" x 7.25"
  • Large: 10" x 10.5"

Leprechaun 1:  

  • Small: 5" x 6.5"
  • Medium: 8" x 10.5"
  • Large: 9" x 12" 

No More Beer:

  • Medium: 8" x 7.5"
  • Large: 12" x 11.3"

  • Medium: 6" x 8.3"
  • Large: 8" x 11"

Lucky Sheet:

  • Small: 4" x 3.5"
  • Medium: 8" x 7" 
  • Large: 12" x 10.5"

  • Medium: 6" x 8"
